channel.title: Upgrading MySQL major version on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Upgrading MySQL major version on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes

item.title: Upgrading MySQL group replication major version
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. This is an Enterprise-only feature. Please install KubeDB Enterprise Edition to try this feature. Upgrade major version of MySQL Group Replication This guide will show you how to use KubeDB enterprise operator to upgrade the major version of MySQL Group Replication. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster.

item.title: Upgrading MySQL standalone major version
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. This is an Enterprise-only feature. Please install KubeDB Enterprise Edition to try this feature. Upgrade major version of MySQL Standalone This guide will show you how to use KubeDB enterprise operator to upgrade the major version of MySQL standalone. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster.
